meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: In Ukraine, you can buy many things with a hryvnia.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for hryvnias at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The hryvnia in my pocket felt like a lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand hryvnias.
meanings.sent5: The colorful hryvnia bill fluttered in the wind.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: The price of bread increased by one hryvnia.
meanings.sent2: Tourists often wonder about the value of the hryvnia.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally washed my hryvnia in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: His words carried more weight than any hryvnia.
meanings.sent5: The hryvnia jingled in his pocket as he walked.
